com.doodeec.utils.network

Class ServerRequest<LT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer,CommunicatorResponse<ReturnType>>
      • com.doodeec.utils.network.BaseServerRequest<LT,java.lang.String>
        • com.doodeec.utils.network.ServerRequest<LT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CancellableServerRequest

    public class ServerRequest<LT>
extends BaseServerRequest<LT,java.lang.String>
    Server request AsyncTask wrapper around HttpURLConnection Can be executed with AsyncTask.THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR to evaluate requests in parallel
    See Also:
    BaseRequestListener, JSONRequestListener, ErrorType, RequestError

      • setResponseCharset

        public static void setResponseCharset(java.lang.String canonicalName)
                               throws java.nio.charset.IllegalCharsetNameException,
                                      java.nio.charset.UnsupportedCharsetException
        Globally sets response charset It is required only once, since charset is static * Charset can be: - ASCII - US-ASCII - utf-8 - utf-16 - utf-16be - utf-16le - cp1250 - cp852 - iso-8859-1 - iso-8859-2
        Parameters:
        canonicalName - charset name
        Throws:
        java.nio.charset.IllegalCharsetNameException
        java.nio.charset.UnsupportedCharsetException
